components_audited.notes: Proper ARIA roles, keyboard navigable, screen reader compatible
Uses role=alert for live region announcements
Focus trap, modal behavior, proper ARIA attributes
Alt text support for images, fallback for missing images
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Proper button semantics, focus visible, keyboard operable
Semantic HTML structure
Proper checkbox semantics, aria-checked support
Table semantics, sortable columns keyboard accessible
Focus trap, ESC to close, aria-labelledby/describedby
Menu semantics, arrow key navigation, checkmark indicators
Form field labeling, error messaging with aria-describedby
Focus visible, placeholder guidance, label association
Proper label/input association via htmlFor
Focus management, keyboard dismissible
progressbar role, aria-valuenow/min/max attributes
Radio group semantics, arrow key navigation
Keyboard scrollable content
Combobox semantics, keyboard navigation, value announcement
Decorative by default, proper role=separator when semantic
Hidden from assistive technology by default
Slider role, keyboard operable, value announcement
Switch role, aria-checked, keyboard toggle
Proper table semantics with th/td elements
Tablist/tab/tabpanel roles, arrow key navigation
Focus visible, label association
Live region announcements, dismissible
Keyboard triggerable, proper hide timing

wcag_criteria_coverage.1.1.1: Non-text Content - All images have alt text alternatives
wcag_criteria_coverage.1.3.1: Info and Relationships - Semantic HTML structure maintained
wcag_criteria_coverage.1.4.1: Use of Color - Color not sole means of conveying information
wcag_criteria_coverage.1.4.13: Content on Hover or Focus - Dismissible, hoverable, persistent
wcag_criteria_coverage.2.1.1: Keyboard - All functionality operable via keyboard
wcag_criteria_coverage.2.4.3: Focus Order - Focus follows logical reading order
wcag_criteria_coverage.2.4.7: Focus Visible - Focus indicator visible on all interactive elements
wcag_criteria_coverage.3.3.2: Labels or Instructions - Form inputs properly labeled
wcag_criteria_coverage.4.1.2: Name, Role, Value - Components have proper ARIA attributes
wcag_criteria_coverage.4.1.3: Status Messages - Dynamic content announced to screen readers
